statements: UPDATE trivia_game SET player_name = 'Alice' WHERE question_id = 1;
UPDATE trivia_game SET player_score = 100 WHERE player_name = 'Bob';
UPDATE trivia_game SET player_name = 'Charlie', player_score = 75 WHERE question_id = 3;
UPDATE trivia_game SET player_name = 'Alice', player_score = 100 WHERE question_id = 1;
UPDATE trivia_game SET player_score = player_score + 10 WHERE player_name = 'Bob';
UPDATE trivia_game SET player_name = 'Charlie', player_score = 150 WHERE player_name = 'David';
UPDATE questions SET question_text = 'New text' WHERE question_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
UPDATE player_scores SET score = 100 WHERE player_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-987654321cba';
UPDATE questions SET question_text = 'Updated question' WHERE question_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-987654321cba';
UPDATE questions SET question_text = 'New question text' WHERE question_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE player_scores SET score = score + 10 WHERE player_id = '98765432-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
UPDATE questions q SET question_text = 'Modified question text', updated_at = NOW() FROM player_scores p WHERE q.question_id = p.player_id;

UPDATE answers SET answer_text = 'Updated answer text' WHERE answer_id = 1;
